field.name: select_value_id
field.comment: Select value set which this option belongs to.

field.name: title
field.title: Option Label
field.comment: Option string as displayed to users - e.g. the label in an HTML OPTION tag.

field.name: name
field.title: Option Value
field.comment: May be used to store an option value that is different from the title. One use case is when a non-translated value needs to be set / sent to another application.

field.name: grouping
field.title: Option Grouping Name
field.comment: Use to sort and/or set display properties for sub-set(s) of options within a selection set. EXAMPLE: Use for college_interest field, to differentiate partners from non-partners.

field.name: is_default
field.comment: Is this the default option for the selection set?

field.name: is_optgroup
field.comment: Is this row simply a display header? Expected usage is to render these as OPTGROUP tags within a SELECT field list of options?

field.name: is_reserved
field.comment: Is this a predefined system object?
